item.title: About
item.description:
上弦月民乐组合（Crescent Chinese Music Studio, CCMS）是成立于北卡三角区的一个小型非营利性音乐工作室，其宗旨是传播中国音乐文化、服务与丰富社区文化生活。组合包括笛子、琵琶、二胡、古筝、扬琴、中阮等中国民族乐器，以及钢琴和吉他等西洋乐器，并配合使用电声乐队等西方音乐元素来演奏流行音乐、新民乐和传统音乐。

Crescent Chinese Music Studio is a non-profit music studio established in the North Carolina RTP area. Its mission is to promote Chinese music culture, serve and enrich community cultural life. The orchestra includes Chinese folk instruments such as dizi, pipa, erhu, guzheng, yangqin, and zhongruan, as well as Western musical instruments such as piano and guitar. It also uses pop music and other Western musical elements to play pop music, new folk music, and traditional music.
